name: Aging Room - Bin No. 2 - Grande
additionalNotes: A highly anticipated follow up to Rafael Nodalâ€™s enormously popular Bin No.1 blend, Aging Room Bin No. 2 cigars are a special Nicaraguan puro line that uses only tobaccos grown on the volcanic soils from the Ometepe region of the country. This remarkably rich soil is prized for its unique flavors that can only be found in this lush fertile Island set beneath two majestic volcanic mountains. Aging Room Bin No. 2 cigars capture the splendor of Ometepe with rich full-flavored notes of leather, wood, and spice, enriched with a sweet creamy finish.
